Refrences.Name: Replace Text
Refrences.Sample: {CS Exp=""abc".Replace("b","d")"} will  change abc to adc

Refrences.Name: Text Contains
Refrences.UseCase: Check if provided text is present in string
Refrences.Sample: {CS Exp=""abc".Contains("b")"} will return true if b is present in abc

Refrences.Name: Add
Refrences.Sample: {CS Exp="5+3"} will return 8 for 5+3. It will return 2.5 for 5/2.0 but will return 2 for 5/2

Refrences.Name: Starts With
Refrences.UseCase: Check if provided string Starts with provided characters
Refrences.Sample: {CS Exp=""Abc".StartsWith("A")"} will return true as Abc Starts with A

Refrences.Name: Ends With
Refrences.UseCase: Check if provided string Ends with provided characters
Refrences.Sample: {CS Exp=""Abc".EndsWith("c")"} will return true as Abc Ends with B

Refrences.Name: Get String Length
Refrences.Sample: {CS Exp=""Abc".Length"} will return 3 as length of string

Refrences.Name: Get Substring
Refrences.UseCase: Get sub strings from provided starting index(base 0) of specified
Refrences.Sample: {CS Exp=""Abcdefgh".Substring(1,3)"}  will return bcd from starting index 1(base 0) of length r
